name: vscode-docker
description: Adds syntax highlighting, commands, hover tips, and linting for Dockerfile and docker-compose files.

containerName.description: Name of the container used for debugging.

dockerServerReadyAction.description: Options for launching a browser to the Docker container. Similar to serverReadyAction, but replaces container ports with host ports.

action.description: The action to take when the pattern is found.

containerName.description: The container name to match the host port.

pattern.description: The regex pattern to look for in Debug console output.

webRoot.description: The root folder from which web pages are served.

removeContainerAfterDebug.description: Whether to remove the debug container after debugging.

platform.description: The target plaform for the application.

netCore.description: Options for debugging .NET Core projects in Docker.

appProject.description: The .NET Core project (.csproj, .fsproj, etc.) to debug.

node.description: Options for debugging Node.js projects in Docker.

address.description: TCP/IP address of the debug port.

sourceMaps.description: Enable source maps by setting this to `true`.

outFiles.description: Array of glob patterns for locating generated JavaScript files.

autoAttachChildProcesses.description: Track all subprocesses of debuggee and automatically attach to those that are launched in debug mode.

timeout.description: When restarting a session, give up after this number of milliseconds.

stopOnEntry.description: Break immediately when the program launches.

remoteRoot.description: Node's root directory within the Docker container.

smartStep.description: Try to automatically step over code that doesn't map to source files.

skipFiles.description: Automatically skip files covered by these glob patterns.

appFolder.description: Path to the folder for the application.

appOutput.description: Path to the output assembly for the application.

appProject.description: Path to the application project file.

dockerBuild.description: Options for building the Docker image used for debugging.

args.description: Build arguments applied to the Docker image used for debugging.

context.description: Path to the Docker build context.

dockerfile.description: Path to the Dockerfile used for the build.

labels.description: Labels applied to the Docker image used for debugging.

tag.description: Tag applied to the Docker image used for debugging.

target.description: Docker build target (stage) used for debugging.

dockerRun.description: Options for running the Docker container used for debugging.

containerName.description: Name of the container used for debugging.

env.description: Environment variables applied to the Docker container used for debugging.

envFiles.description: Files of environment variables read in and applied to the Docker container used for debugging.

labels.description: Labels applied to the Docker container used for debugging.

network.description: The network to which the container will be connected.

networkAlias.description: The network-scoped alias to assign to the container.

ports.description: Ports that are going to be mapped on the host.

hostPort.description: Port number to be bound on the host.

containerPort.description: Port number of the container to be bound.

protocol.description: Specific protocol for the binding (`tcp | udp`).

extraHosts.description: Hosts to be added to the container's `hosts` file for DNS resolution.

volumes.description: Volumes that are going to be mapped to the container.

localPath.description: Path on local machine that will be mapped. The folder will be created if it does not exist.

containerPath.description: Path where the volume will be mapped within the container. The folder will be created if it does not exist.

permissions.description: Permissions for the container for the mapped volume, `rw` for read-write or `ro` for read-only.

configureAspNetCoreSsl.description: Whether to configure certificate and other settings to enable SSL on ASP.NET Core web services.

dockerBuild.description: Options for building the Docker image used for debugging.

buildArgs.description: Build arguments applied to the Docker image used for debugging.

context.description: Path to the Docker build context.

dockerfile.description: Path to the Dockerfile used for the build.

labels.description: Labels applied to the Docker image used for debugging.

includeDefaults.description: Whether to include the default set of labels defined by the Docker extension

tag.description: Tag applied to the Docker image used for debugging.

target.description: Docker build target (stage) used for debugging.

pull.description: Whether or not to pull new base images before building.

platform.description: The target plaform for the application.

netCore.description: Options for building .NET Core projects in Docker.

appProject.description: The .NET Core project (.csproj, .fsproj, etc.) to build.

node.description: Options for building Node.js applications in Docker.

package.description: The path to the package.json for the application.

dockerRun.description: Options for running the Docker container used for debugging.

command.description: The command to run upon starting the container.

containerName.description: Name of the container used for debugging.

env.description: Environment variables applied to the Docker container used for debugging.

envFiles.description: Files of environment variables read in and applied to the Docker container used for debugging.

labels.description: Labels applied to the Docker container used for debugging.

includeDefaults.description: Whether to include the default set of labels defined by the Docker extension

network.description: The network to which the container will be connected.

networkAlias.description: The network-scoped alias to assign to the container.

ports.description: Ports that are going to be mapped on the host.

hostPort.description: Port number to be bound on the host.

containerPort.description: Port number of the container to be bound.

protocol.description: Specific protocol for the binding (`tcp | udp`).

portsPublishAll.description: Whether to publish all exposed container ports to random ports on the host.

extraHosts.description: Hosts to be added to the container's `hosts` file for DNS resolution.

volumes.description: Volumes that are going to be mapped to the container.

localPath.description: Path on local machine that will be mapped. The folder will be created if it does not exist.

containerPath.description: Path where the volume will be mapped within the container. The folder will be created if it does not exist.

permissions.description: Permissions for the container for the mapped volume, `rw` for read-write or `ro` for read-only.

platform.description: The target plaform for the application.

netCore.description: Options for running .NET Core projects in Docker.

appProject.description: The .NET Core project (.csproj, .fsproj, etc.) to build.

enableDebugging.description: Whether to enable debugging within the container.

configureSsl.description: Whether to configure certificate and other settings to enable SSL on ASP.NET Core web services.

node.description: Options for running Node.js applications in Docker.

enableDebugging.description: Whether to enable debugging within the container.

inspectMode.description: Whether debugging should break immediately upon application start.

inspectPort.description: The port on which debugging should occur.

package.description: The path to the package.json for the application.

docker.defaultRegistryPath.description: Default registry and path when tagging an image

docker.containers.groupBy.description: The property to use when grouping containers.

docker.containers.description.description: Any secondary properties to display for a container.

docker.containers.label.description: The primary property to display for a container.

docker.containers.sortBy.description: The property to use when sorting containers.

docker.images.groupBy.description: The property to use when grouping images.

docker.images.description.description: Any secondary properties to display for a image.

docker.images.label.description: The primary property to display for a image.

docker.images.sortBy.description: The property to use when sorting images.

docker.networks.groupBy.description: The property to use when grouping networks.

docker.networks.description.description: Any secondary properties to display for a network.

docker.networks.label.description: The primary property to display for a network.

docker.networks.sortBy.description: The property to use when sorting networks.

docker.volumes.groupBy.description: The property to use when grouping volumes.

docker.volumes.description.description: Any secondary properties to display for a volume.

docker.volumes.label.description: The primary property to display for a volume.

docker.volumes.sortBy.description: The property to use when sorting volumes.

docker.imageBuildContextPath.description: Build context PATH to pass to Docker build command

docker.truncateLongRegistryPaths.description: Truncate long Image and Container registry paths in the Explorer

docker.truncateMaxLength.description: Maximum number of characters for long registry paths in the Explorer, including elipsis

docker.host.description: Equivalent to setting the DOCKER_HOST environment variable.

docker.certPath.description: Equivalent to setting the DOCKER_CERT_PATH environment variable.

docker.tlsVerify.description: Equivalent to setting the DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY environment variable.

docker.machineName.description: Equivalent to setting the DOCKER_MACHINE_NAME environment variable.

docker.languageserver.diagnostics.deprec.description: Controls the diagnostic severity for the deprecated MAINTAINER instruction

docker.languageserver.diagnostics.emptyC.description: Controls the diagnostic severity for flagging empty continuation lines found in instructions that span multiple lines

docker.languageserver.diagnostics.direct.description: Controls the diagnostic severity for parser directives that are not written in lowercase

docker.languageserver.diagnostics.instru.description: Controls the diagnostic severity for instructions that are not written in uppercase
Controls the diagnostic severity for flagging a Dockerfile with multiple CMD instructions
Controls the diagnostic severity for flagging a Dockerfile with multiple ENTRYPOINT instructions
Controls the diagnostic severity for flagging a Dockerfile with multiple HEALTHCHECK instructions
Controls the diagnostic severity for JSON instructions that are written incorrectly with single quotes
Controls the diagnostic severity for WORKDIR instructions that do not point to an absolute path

docker.attachShellCommand.linuxContainer.description: Attach command to use for Linux containers

docker.attachShellCommand.windowsContain.description: Attach command to use for Windows containers

docker.dockerComposeBuild.description: Run docker-compose with the --build argument, defaults to true

docker.dockerComposeDetached.description: Run docker-compose with the --d (detached) argument, defaults to true

docker.showRemoteWorkspaceWarning.description: Show a prompt to switch from "UI" extension to "Workspace" extension if an operation is not supported.

commands.title: Deploy Image to Azure App Service...

scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run webpack
scripts.all: npm i && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.webpack-profile: webpack --profile --json --mode production > webpack-stats.json && echo Use http://webpack.github.io/analyse to analyze the stats
